question: Dr. Rajendra Prasad was not a member of which of the following committees of the constituent assembly ?
option1: Committee on the rules of procedure
option2: Ad Hoc committee on National Flag
explanation: Dr. Rajendra Prasad was the head of different committees under the Constituent Assembly for the Indian constitution, some of which were Committee on Procedure Rules, Steering Committee, Finance and Staff Committee, Ad Hoc committee on National Flag.
